title: Artificial Intelligence-Based Approaches for Catalyst Design and Optimization

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Emphasis on hands-on practice and project-based learning utilizing digital devices

learning_goals: Identify and explain key physicochemical parameters (e.g., composition, electronegativity, temperature) for optimizing catalytic performance
Analyze experimental data using subgroup discovery (SGD) techniques and derive design rules for high-performance catalysts
Design catalytic systems with various elemental combinations through project-based learning and apply them to real-world problems
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
